ohha.puzzlecrafter.puzzles

Class Fillomino

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohha.puzzlecrafter.puzzles.Puzzle
      • ohha.puzzlecrafter.puzzles.Fillomino

  • public class Fillomino
extends Puzzle
    Implements the Fillomino puzzle style. Solver performance is currently slow.

    • Method Detail

      • setCell

        public void setCell(CellCoordinate c,
                    int value)
        Description copied from class: Puzzle
        Fills the given value into the cell at the given coordinate. This is the intended method for the solver to fill the grid with. Compare to Puzzle.setGiven(CellCoordinate, int), whose purpose is to insert pre-filled values as hints to the solver.

        Givens may not hold the value Grid.UNDETERMINED_CELL. If this method is asked to set that value, it won't.

        Overrides:
        setCell in class Puzzle
        Parameters:
        c - the coordinate of the cell to fill
        value - the value to fill in

      • setCellUndetermined

        public void setCellUndetermined(CellCoordinate c)
        Description copied from class: Puzzle
        Sets a cell's value to Grid.UNDETERMINED_CELL. This method is intended to be used when the solver resets a cell's contents, instead of Puzzle.setCell(CellCoordinate, int) and Puzzle.setGiven(CellCoordinate, int), which will fail if trying to assign an undecided.
        Overrides:
        setCellUndetermined in class Puzzle
        Parameters:
        c - the cell whose value to reset.

      • getCandidates

        public List<Integer> getCandidates(CellCoordinate cell)
        Description copied from class: Puzzle
        Returns a possibly pruned selection of values the cell at the given coordinate may take, considering the puzzle's state. This method is provided so that concrete puzzle implementations have a way of weeding out clearly unsuitable values by overriding it. No pruning is required, but the implementations mustn't filter out genuine candidates.

        Compare to Puzzle.getValues(), whose purpose is to supply the full selection of values that are permitted in the puzzle.

        Overrides:
        getCandidates in class Puzzle
        Parameters:
        cell - the coordinate of the cell whose possible values are requested
        Returns:
        a list of feasible values that may go into the given cell

      • isPartialSolution

        public boolean isPartialSolution(CellCoordinate cell)
        Description copied from class: Puzzle
        Returns true if the current state of the puzzle is possible to be completed into a full solution, that is the state of the puzzle is not in contradiction with the puzzle's rules. This method must be implemented case by case in each puzzle.

        The passed parameter is the coordinate of the cell where the solver last filled a value, as it is most often sufficient to check that the rules of the puzzle still hold only around the cell that changed.

        Specified by:
        isPartialSolution in class Puzzle
        Parameters:
        cell - the cell last modified by the solver
        Returns:
        true if the puzzle may be completed into a valid solution, false otherwise

      • deepCopy

        public Puzzle deepCopy()
        Description copied from class: Puzzle
        Returns a deep copy of the puzzle. This method allows the solving algorithm to copy the solved puzzle into a list of solutions, and then further mutate the puzzle object it is solving.

        It must be implemented by each concrete puzzle implementation so that it captures all the additional structures each puzzle might have, and that the puzzle object has the correct subclass. Regrettably this seems to result in a lot of copied code.

        Specified by:
        deepCopy in class Puzzle
        Returns:
        a deep copy of the puzzle
